Uses of Class
logic.LogicException

  • Packages that use LogicException 
    Package Description
    logic  

    • Uses of LogicException in logic

      Methods in logic that throw LogicException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PlayState Play.calculatePoints​(PlayState ps, GameSettings gameSettings, boolean declarerWins)
      calculates the value of the game.
      Player Trick.calculateWinner​(PlayState ps)
      the winning card is calculated and the winner is returned submethods (depending on PlayMode): calculateWinnerColour(), calculateWinnerGrand(), calculateWinnerNull()).
      static boolean ClientLogic.checkIfCardPossible​(Card card, Card firstCard, PlayState playState, Player player)
      its is checked if the card can be played by the player depending on his hand, the first Colour of the trick and the PlayMode.
      void ClientLogic.checkWhatHappensNext​(Player playedLastCard, Card card)
      checks what happens next, by updating the playState, checks if trick/play/game is over and calculates the respective winners, also checks if this player is supposed to play the next card.
      void Player.removeCardFromHand​(Card card)
      removes a given card from the hand.
      void ClientLogic.showPossibleCards​(Card firstCard)
      called, after the controller wanted to play a card, he's not allowed to play.
      Constructors in logic that throw LogicException 
      Constructor Description
      GameSettings​(CountRule countRule, int nrOfPlayers, int nrOfPlays)
      creates random nr between 0-2 or 0-3.
